setup_script_description: Moves focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
specific_user_instruction: Open 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to the 'Left' menu item using down arrow key | Close submenu and return focus to 'Text Align' menu item
output_assertions: The menu item opens a popup is conveyed
Closed state of the submenu is conveyed
The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed
